name: v0.13
body:
Adding support of new languages : 
traditional and modern chinese thanks to "myjourney", 
turkish language, 
dutch translations, 
indonesian language thanks to "isaideureka" and "fafarsdq", 
spanish language thanks to "Andr√©s Ignacio Torres".

name: v0.12
body:
BUGFIX: Fixing empty list when coming from background
NEW: Improving category background colors readability

name: v0.11
body:
NEW : Using new nice looking TextInputLayout for edit texts
NEW : ISS#45 Adding a parameter for display of trip dates on homepage
NEW : Improving category re-use in suggestions

name: bug fixes on v0.10 (again)
body: This release is a second try to fix crashes on start (empty trip name) on version 0.10 and 0.10.1

name: bug fixes on v0.10
body: This is a bugfix release after crashes encountered by some users at app start on v0.10

name: categories and automatic suggestions are available
body:
NEW : german translations thanks to Christophe Paccolat
NEW : adding material letter icon on trip list
**NEW : adding button for automatic suggestion of missing items**
**NEW : adding categories in list of items**
NEW : automatic suggestion of items and categories while typing
BUGFIX : ISS#38 Importing text file, checkboxes are incorrectly managed
BUGFIX : ISS#36 Mass import submit button not visible on some phones
BUGFIX : ISS#35 Remember last used sort mode

name: New functionnalities : export , uncheck all, improved sorting
body:
NEW : ISS#27 export to readable format
NEW : improving sorting of items
NEW : ISS#31 Make a cloned trip by default all unchecked
NEW : ISS#32 Uncheck all items of a trip
NEW : adding illustrations for empty lists
NEW : adding travel name in action bar
NEW : applying suggestions of Google accessibility app scanner

name: v0.8.1
body:
ISS#25 adding ACRA for generating crash reports
ISS#26 fixing crash when modifying an item
ISS#22 addition of a packing weight
ISS#23 replacing "PACKED" by a checkbox
ISS#24 basic optional item sorting based on packing status

name: v0.8
body:
NEW : ISS#13 support of item weights
NEW : ISS#20 mass import in a trip (i.e. from external text file)

name: bug fixes
body:
```
<changelogversion
    changeDate="22th march 2016"
    versionName="0.7.1">
    <changelogtext>BUGFIX : ISS#19 date format was ignored on old android versions</changelogtext>
    <changelogtext>BUGFIX : ISS#21 packlist display jumps to top upon every (un)pack of an item</changelogtext>
</changelogversion>
```

name: bug fixes
body:
Fixing issues signaled by first active users, many thanks to them.
    <changelogversion
        changeDate="19th march 2016"
        versionName="0.7.0">
        <changelogtext>BUGFIX : ISS#15 fixing rotation restarts activity</changelogtext>
        <changelogtext>BUGFIX : ISS#16 new added item is under virtual keyboard</changelogtext>
        <changelogtext>BUGFIX : ISS#18 crash when displaying a trip with no start date</changelogtext>
    </changelogversion>

```
<changelogversion
    changeDate="14th march 2016"
    versionName="0.6.0">
    <changelogtext>NEW : adding remaining days before departure in trip list</changelogtext>
    <changelogtext>NEW : ISS10 ordering trip list by start date</changelogtext>
    <changelogtext>NEW : adding possibility to clone a previous trip</changelogtext>
    <changelogtext>NEW : supporting tablet (landscape)</changelogtext>
    <changelogtext>NEW : adding japanese translation thanks to naofum</changelogtext>
</changelogversion>
```

name: Mark items as packed (and bugfixes)
body: Allow to mark items as packed (and also some bugfixes)

name: Adding possibility to edit trip and delete items

body: Better management of empty fields, adding date picker

name: 0.2 still light version
body: A version with a very minimum functional, yet a ot of work...

First version published as alpha on play store.
Basic functionality are still under development, not usable as-is
